View Ribbon Widgets Module¶

class proteus.view.widgets.ribbons.ribbon.Ribbon(parent: QWidget, tab_widget: QTabWidget)¶

Ribbon styled top menu.

add_tab(name: str) → RibbonTabContent¶

Adds a tab to the ribbon menu.

Parameters:

name – Tab name.

Returns:

Tab widget.

connect_buttons()¶

Method that connects the buttons to the actions.

create_buttons() → None¶

Method that create buttons.

tabs_add_button()¶

Adds buttons to the tabs.

class proteus.view.widgets.ribbons.ribbon_button_group.RibbonButtonGroup(title: str)¶

Ribbon Button Group contains group buttons and group label.

add_button(button: QPushButton) → None¶

Adds a button to the group.

Parameters:

button – Button to add.

class proteus.view.widgets.ribbons.ribbon_tab_content.RibbonTabContent¶

Tab Widget container.

add_group(title: str) → RibbonButtonGroup¶

Adds a group to a tab.

Parameters:

title – Group title.

Returns:

Button group.
